title: Sheikh Rashid visits market to buy sacrificial animals
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Minister for Interior Sheikh Rashid Ahmad on Tuesday visited the Islamabad Cattle market to buy sacrificial animals for Eid-ul-Azha to perform the Sunnah of Prophet Hazrat Ibrahim (AS).
He made a good bargain with the sellers and bought three camels for Rs 560,000.
It is the practice of Sheikh Rashid that he buys sacrificial animals by himself every year.
